Title: Forestry construction of New China
Designer: Chinese National Science Popularization Association (中华全国科学技术普及协会)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: A 5-poster series, outlining developments in forestry since 1949.Entitled "Universal forest protection" (普遍护林), it shows mounted members of the People's Liberation Army in winter, protecting resources; a watchtower; fire-fighting equipment; pest control; and a fire drill.
